name: Space Dash (FluxBot Studios)
description:
Space Dash is currently a single-player 2D shoot em up were you the player fight waves of enemies and boss. Currently, the game is very basic and should only be used as a basic example of the game. 

Controlls

Keyboard:

W: Move Forward

S: Move Backwards

A: Turn Left

D: Turn Right

Space / Left click: Shoot
